alert.note: Alert for Beaver; Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 8:10PM CDT until May 28 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Eastern Texas County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Northern Hansford County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northeastern Sherman County in the Panhandle of Texas... Northwestern Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 810 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hooker to near Guymon to Texhoma, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Guymon, Perryton, Spearman, Hooker, Goodwell, Optima, Hardesty, Elmwood, Adams, Farnsworth, Boyd, Waka, Bryans Corner, Baker, Balko and Texhoma. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
